| **Dallas** |   | 34 | 31 | 123 | 112 | 120 | 150 | 184 | 142 | 145 |
| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 93 | 84 | 109 | 169 | 215 | 161 | 128 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 98 | 77 | 89 | 174 | 215 | 168 | 121 |
| **Frankfurt** |  123 | 92 | 98 |  | 12 | 29 | 233 | 250 | 225 | 198 |
| **London** |  113 | 84 | 77 | 12 |  | 26 | 244 | 261 | 236 | 188 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 107 | 88 | 29 | 27 |  | 257 | 274 | 251 | 209 |
| **Osaka** |  150 | 170 | 175 | 232 | 244 | 257 |  | 144 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  184 | 215 | 215 | 250 | 263 | 275 | 144 |  | 136 | 328 |
| **Tokyo** |  142 | 162 | 167 | 225 | 237 | 250 | 9 | 131 |  | 286 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  145 | 132 | 122 | 196 | 187 | 205 | 293 | 327 | 284 |  |
